vsParam:
Good for you, [px]!
You did make what Marjoram Sensei mentioned.

But what do we do with it?
I don't know how it works...

Oh—, hi, everyone—. You're working
so hard to cut down the Autumn Treants.

Tandrion!
How are you? Did your sneeze get any better?

Yeah, thanks to you.
The Autumn Treants have been reduced significantly.

Thank you so much. You're close to inheriting
the name of "King of the Red Hunt Festival" Junior?

King of the Red... Hunt Festival?
What is that?

Yeah, I learned that from someone else.
There was once an Autumn Treant riot long long ago.
Back then, a brave woodman challenged these Treants single-handedly.

Thanks to his effort, the Academy's crisis was resolved.
He was honored as "King of the Red Hunt Festival".

Oh, I didn't know that story...
Hmm, if only that woodman is here~

Haha, you're right...
But you resolved this crisis, didn't you?

Right, it seems that woodman wore gear
made of ingredients from the Autumn Treants...

How about that? Would you like to try making the same gear!?
Maybe it will make your battle easier?

Yeah, that makes sense! It seems Marjoram Sensei
once said we can use those ingredients to make gears!
Hee hee, I didn't expect you are that smart, Tandrion!

No need to say "you didn't expect that"! But whatever.
Anyway, I'll leave the rest job to you~

The gear of "King of the Red Hunt Festival"!
Wow, it sounds impressive!

And it helps to wipe out the Autumn Treants...
Try to make it when you're available, [px]!

Use the intermediate material as the ingredients
to synthesize the gear!

You're close to wiping out all the Autumn Treants!
Continue the hunt for the sake of the Academy!
